enableCustomCss.description: Enable the use of CSS in form

allowAnonymous.description: Allow Anonymous access to Form Settings

enablePlugins.description: Enable the use of form plugins in form

enableAuthTaskFormsRedirect.description: Enable redirecting all Authenticated Task forms into My Nintex

enableAiFormGenerator.description: Enable the use of AI form generator in form

enableFormPdfConverter.description: Enable the use of form pdf converter in form

Authorization.description: Bearer Token should belong to admin role
